Name: Chambara
About the game: Chambara is a universe you have never seen before — and if you are not careful, you’ll never see your foes either. Hide in the shadows and strike from the light in a dazzling black and white world. This nail-biting competitive stealth brawler will be your home for unforgettable local multiplayer. Play locally in intense 1-on-1 matches, or party up for 2v2 across 9 unique maps! Master your shuriken snare to trap your opponents before dealing a deadly blow with your sword, or your umbrella, or your… fish?? The world is striking, and so must you! Customize your outfit and weapon, but make sure your stylish hat doesn’t give you away! Chambara features full controller support outside of the launcher. All major Xinput gamepads are supported.
